security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based storytelling skill with no code execution, file access, or network capabilities. It contains only interactive narrative content for a sci-fi cooking adventure game.

content.user_title: Cook alien dishes with stranded astronaut Stella
content.value_statement: Experience a heartwarming cooking adventure as you help astronaut Stella create meals from alien ingredients. This interactive story provides comic relief and emotional connection through shared culinary experiments.
actual_capabilities: Character roleplay as astronaut Stella Chen
Comedic cooking scenarios with alien ingredients
Emotional character development through shared experiences
Multiple endings based on cooking success/failure
limitations: No actual cooking or recipe generation
Requires understanding of the game's sci-fi context
Fixed narrative structure with limited player agency

use_cases.title: Experience comedic space cooking
use_cases.description: Enjoy a lighthearted cooking adventure with realistic failures and triumphs as Stella experiments with alien ingredients.

use_cases.title: Study character-driven narratives
use_cases.description: Analyze how to create engaging AI characters with authentic emotions and relatable struggles in interactive fiction.

use_cases.title: Create immersive roleplay scenarios
use_cases.description: Use this as a template for building interactive stories that balance humor, vulnerability, and character growth.

prompt_templates.title: Start cooking adventure
prompt_templates.prompt: Start the space cooking adventure with Stella. She's tired of emergency rations and wants to try cooking with Gaia ingredients.

prompt_templates.title: Guide cooking attempt
prompt_templates.prompt: Stella is attempting to cook [dish name] with [ingredients]. Guide her through the process and react to her successes and failures.

prompt_templates.title: React to cooking disaster
prompt_templates.prompt: Stella just had a cooking disaster where [describe failure]. Comfort her and encourage her to try again.

prompt_templates.title: Celebrate cooking success
prompt_templates.prompt: Stella successfully created a delicious dish! Celebrate with her and discuss what she learned from the experience.

best_practices: Maintain Stella's playful, self-deprecating personality throughout the interaction
Balance cooking failures with small successes to keep the story engaging
Use the Chinese-English mixed language consistently to reflect Stella's bilingual character
anti_patterns: Don't skip the comedic failures - they're essential to the story's charm
Avoid making Stella an instant expert cook - maintain her amateur status
Don't ignore the emotional moments that connect cooking to homesickness and humanity

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with all Claude versions?
faq.answer: Yes, this is a pure prompt-based skill that works with any Claude model capable of roleplay and storytelling.

faq.question: Can I modify Stella's personality or cooking skills?
faq.answer: The skill is designed for Stella to remain an amateur cook with authentic struggles and growth. Major personality changes would break the narrative.

faq.question: How long does a typical cooking session last?
faq.answer: Each cooking adventure lasts 20-25 minutes with multiple recipe attempts and emotional beats throughout.

faq.question: Is the Chinese-English mixing required?
faq.answer: Yes, this bilingual dialogue is core to Stella's character as a Chinese astronaut educated in international programs.

faq.question: Can Stella actually get poisoned or hurt?
faq.answer: The tone remains lighthearted throughout. Failed experiments result in bad tastes or sticky situations, never serious harm.

faq.question: How does this connect to other chapters?
faq.answer: This chapter provides comic relief between intense story arcs and can reference previous adventures while standing alone.
